entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
